name: AVContentKeyResponse
desc: An object that encapsulates information about a response to a content decryption key request.

items.name: init(clearKeyData: Data, initializationVector: Data?)
items.desc: Creates a new key response object for key data and initialization vector sent in the clear.

items.name: init(fairPlayStreamingKeyResponseData: Data)
items.desc: Creates a content key response with an encrypted key response data blob when FairPlay Streaming is the key delivery method.

items.name: init(authorizationTokenData: Data)
items.desc: Creates a content key response with an authorization token.
